**Describe your solution clearly**
Most likely, the select and input have some fixed width CSS properties on them (`width` or `min-width`). I would remove this and replace with a dynamic width that respects the width of the parent element.

**Possible approach**
- Use calc() just like @hrit2773 has mentioned
- Use grid/flexbox on the parent and justify the children to stretch (with a max-width)
